item.title: How Trump’s push to privatize Medicare would be a disaster for seniors
item.description: Medicare Advantage is more costly for Americans than traditional Medicare. So why does Trump favor it?

item.title: Can I use investment losses to offset taxes on an IRA withdrawal?
